question: What is SharedTable?
answer: SharedTable is an innovative platform designed to streamline restaurant operations, enhance customer engagement, and promote food sustainability by minimizing food wastage.

question: How does SharedTable help reduce food wastage?
answer: Restaurants can post their leftover foods on the platform, allowing people to get the food for free or at very low prices, thereby minimizing food waste.

question: How can I support my favorite restaurant on SharedTable?
answer: You can support restaurants by donating directly to them through the platform.

question: Which regions does SharedTable currently support?
answer: We currently only deliver in Hong Kong but we are rapidly expanding to ensure greater reach across other APAC countries.

question: How can I support SharedTable?
answer: Users can support SharedTable by donating to the platform, helping us to keep the service running: http://localhost:5173/donate-support . They can also post advertisements to both help benefit their publicity and support us at the same time: http://localhost:5173/advertisements.

question: Can I post advertisements on SharedTable?
answer: Yes, SharedTable allows businesses to post advertisements to generate additional revenue: http://localhost:5173/advertisements.

question: How do I add an advertisement on SharedTable?
answer: You can add advertisements by creating a new ad through your account and paying for the post using Stripe payment: http://localhost:5173/advertisements.

question: Can I manage my advertisements on SharedTable?
answer: Yes, you can manage advertisements by changing plans, canceling, and renewing them: http://localhost:5173/advertisements.

question: How do I track my advertisement reach on SharedTable?
answer: You can keep track of how many times your advertisement appeared on peopleâ€™s apps to learn about your advertisement reach: http://localhost:5173/advertisements.

question: Does SharedTable display advertisements randomly?
answer: Yes, SharedTable uses a backend system to randomly choose an advertisement each time and display it to users.

question: How do advertisements appear on SharedTable?
answer: Advertisements are displayed as pop-ups, allowing users to close them if they wish: http://localhost:5173/advertisements.

question: What happens when my advertisement display count is low?
answer: SharedTable prompts users to renew their advertisement plans when the number of times left for the advertisement to be shown is less than five.

question: What is the automatic food recognition feature on SharedTable?
answer: The automatic food recognition feature uses AI to detect food items, simplifying menu entry processes for restaurants. Go to the 'Manage Restaurant' section under this link to check it out! http://localhost:5173/manage-restaurant.

question: How can I use the AI model for food detection?
answer: You can capture an image of the food directly, and the AI model will detect and update the type of food in the manage restaurant section. Go to the 'Manage Restaurant' section under this link to check it out! http://localhost:5173/manage-restaurant.
